response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I believe it has the potential to significantly impact your endeavors. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1,250,000. This is a fair offer that reflects the product's true worth while allowing you to secure it at a competitive advantage. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing its details further with you.", "product_price": 1250000}
